It is difficult to prepare a general questionnaire on pioneer life because no individual who is asked to answer it has exactly the same experiences as another. Some of the questions here will not apply to your experiences and there may prove impossible for you to answer; you don't worry about answering all the questions. If the question does not apply to you, just don't worry about answering it.

This questionnaire is intended for persons who lived in Western Canada before 1924, and may be answered by anyone who has personal experiences of the pioneer years whether or not they were born in this province or not.

If more than one person of the family can answer the questions, they should write them on separate sheets or apply for a separate questionnaire.

Other Questionnaires

Saskatchewan Archives Questionnaire No. 1, entitled "Pioneer Blasts That Made Western Canadian History," is still being circulated. If you have not already answered this, and would be willing to do so please put a check mark here ( ).

and one will be sent to you.

Saskatchewan Archives Questionnaire on other subjects will be prepared at a later date. Those are listed below. Please mark the ones you would be willing to answer.

All Questionnaires

- Pioneer health conditions
- Pioneer social life, sports and recreation
- Pioneer housing and ownership
- Pioneer education and employment
- Pioneer farming and livestock

Preservation of Questionnaires

All questionnaires will be preserved in the Saskatchewan Archives Board's Office at the University of Saskatchewan as part of the permanent record of our province. Please send your completed questionnaire to:

Saskatchewan Archives Office,
University of Saskatchewan,
Saskatoon, Sask.

This questionnaire is intended for persons who have lived in Western Canada before 1924, or may be answered by anyone who has personal experience of the pioneer years whether born in this province or not.

If more than one member of the family can answer the questions, they should write them on separate sheets or reply for a separate questionnaire.

Other Questionnaires

Saskatchewan Archives Questionnaire No. 3, entitled "Pioneer Days That Were," Western Canadian Pioneer Days is still being circulated. If you have not already answered this, and would be willing to do so, please put a sheet mark here ( ) and one will be sent to you.

Saskatchewan Archives questionnaires on other subjects will be prepared at a later date. Those interested are invited to submit their names.

Presentation of Questionnaires
